name: NBA Action '94
overview: NBA Action At Its Finest! The Most Complete NBA Game With 300 Players, All 27 Teams & Special Hall of Fame Option...Hosted by Marv Albert! Realistic Features: - Fast-paced 5-on-5 Action! - Select 20 / 40 / 82 Game Season - 1993-94 NBA Rosters including Ewing, Malone, Kemp, Pippen & more! Great NBA Gameplay - "Speed Bursts" - Substitutions - 14 Different Styles of Rim-Rattling Jams! - Adjustable Defensive Intensity for Each Player - Run Patterned Offensive Plays-Set Screens, Clear-out Special Hall Of Fame Teams - Select from 3 teams of All-Time Greats Including Rick Barry, Bill Walton, Jerry West, "Hondo" Havlicek, "Pistol Pete" Maravich, Willis Reed, Walt Frazier, Bob Cousy & more!
